languages.text: Лорд-капитану предстоит принять непростое решение — сделать последний шаг на дороге кровавых следов и стать кровью флагмана, или же отказаться от стези Матери-паучихи и поисков храма.
The Lord Captain is facing a difficult choice: to take the final step and become the blood of the flagship, or to abandon the path of the Matriarch Spider and {mf|his|her} own search for the temple.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитану предстоит принять непростое решение — сделать последний шаг на дороге кровавых следов и стать кровью флагмана, или же отказаться от стези Матери-паучихи и поисков храма.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain is facing a difficult choice: to take the final step along the road of Ei'dehelim and become the blood of the flagship, or to abandon the way of the Founder and {mf|his|her} own search for the temple.

The Lord Captain is facing a difficult choice: to take the final step along the road of Ei'dehelim and become the blood of the flagship, or to abandon the way of the Founder and {mf|his|her} own search for the temple.
The Lord Captain is facing a difficult choice: to take the final step and become the blood of the flagship, or to abandon the path of the Matriarch Spider and {mf|his|her} own search for the temple.

The Lord Captain is facing a difficult choice: to take the final step and become the blood of the flagship, or to abandon the path of the Matriarch Spider and {mf|his|her} own search for the temple.
The Lord Captain is facing a difficult choice: to take the final step and become the blood of the flagship, or to abandon the path of the Matriarch Spider and {mf|his|her} own search for the temple.

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} est {mf|confronté|confrontée} à un choix difficile : franchir la dernière étape et devenir le sang du vaisseau, ou abandonner la voie de l'araignée matriarche et la recherche du temple.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain is facing a difficult choice: to take the final step and become the blood of the flagship, or to abandon the path of the Matriarch Spider and {mf|his|her} own search for the temple.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} est {mf|confronté|confrontée} à un choix difficile : franchir la dernière étape et devenir le sang du vaisseau, ou abandonner la voie de l'araignée matriarche et la recherche du temple.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán se enfrenta a una difícil elección: dar el último paso y convertirse en la sangre de la nave insignia o abandonar la senda de la Araña Matriarca y buscar el templo por cuenta propia.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain is facing a difficult choice: to take the final step and become the blood of the flagship, or to abandon the path of the Matriarch Spider and {mf|his|her} own search for the temple.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán se enfrenta a una difícil elección: dar el último paso y convertirse en la sangre de la nave insignia o abandonar la senda de la Araña Matriarca y buscar el templo por cuenta propia.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは難しい選択を迫られている。最後の一歩を踏み出して旗艦の血となるか、蜘蛛の師母の道は諦めて神殿探しを断念するか、どちらかひとつだ。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain is facing a difficult choice: to take the final step and become the blood of the flagship, or to abandon the path of the Matriarch Spider and {mf|his|her} own search for the temple.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンは難しい選択を迫られている。最後の一歩を踏み出して旗艦の血となるか、蜘蛛の師母の道は諦めて神殿探しを断念するか、どちらかひとつだ。

languages.text: 行商浪人面临着艰难的抉择——是迈出最后一步，成为旗舰之血？还是放弃最初的织网者曾走过的道路，放弃寻找圣殿的打算？
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain is facing a difficult choice: to take the final step and become the blood of the flagship, or to abandon the path of the Matriarch Spider and {mf|his|her} own search for the temple.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人面临着艰难的抉择——是迈出最后一步，成为旗舰之血？还是放弃最初的织网者曾走过的道路，放弃寻找圣殿的打算？

languages.text: Der Lord Captain muss eine schwierige Entscheidung fällen: den letzten Schritt machen und zum Blut des Flaggschiffs werden oder den Pfad der Matriarchenspinne und {mf|seiner|ihrer} eigenen Suche nach dem Tempel verlassen.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain is facing a difficult choice: to take the final step and become the blood of the flagship, or to abandon the path of the Matriarch Spider and {mf|his|her} own search for the temple.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain muss eine schwierige Entscheidung fällen: den letzten Schritt machen und zum Blut des Flaggschiffs werden oder den Pfad der Matriarchenspinne und {mf|seiner|ihrer} eigenen Suche nach dem Tempel verlassen.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan zorlu bir seçimle karşı karşıya: Son adımı atmak ve sancak gemisinin kanı hâline gelmek ya da Örümcek Kraliçe'nin yolundan ayrılarak tapınağı kendi yöntemleriyle aramak.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain is facing a difficult choice: to take the final step and become the blood of the flagship, or to abandon the path of the Matriarch Spider and {mf|his|her} own search for the temple.
